snippet: The explosion took place Sunday afternoon as thousands were gathering in the capital, Addis Ababa, to watch a World Cup qualifying soccer game between Ethiopia and Nigeria
abstract: Two Somali men killed in a bomb blast are believed to have been plotting an attack in Ethiopia when they accidentally blew themselves up; explosion took place in Addis Ababa as thousands were gathering to watch a World Cup qualifying soccer game between Ethiopia and Nigeria.
lead_paragraph: The explosion took place Sunday afternoon as thousands were gathering in the capital, Addis Ababa, to watch a World Cup qualifying soccer game between Ethiopia and Nigeria

headline.main: Ethiopia: 2 Men Killed While Preparing a Bomb for an Attack, an Official Says
headline.print_headline: Ethiopia: 2 Men Killed While Preparing A Bomb for an Attack, an Official Says
